lesson_boolean_gates_content:
Welcome to Boolean Gates! This section will teach you the fundamentals of boolean logic through interactive puzzles.

Boolean gates are the building blocks of digital circuits. You'll learn about AND, OR, NOT, and other logical operations.

Each puzzle will present you with inputs and gates, and your task is to connect them correctly to achieve the desired output.

Take your time to understand each concept before moving on to the exercises.
lesson_color_sorting_content:
Welcome to Color Sorting! This section challenges you to organize colors based on different properties.

You'll learn to sort colors by various attributes like brightness, hue, saturation, and more.

Each level will present you with a set of colors that need to be arranged in a specific order.

Pay attention to the subtle differences between colors and use your visual skills to complete each challenge.
lesson_control_zone_content:
Welcome to Control Zone! This section focuses on spatial reasoning and precise movement.

You'll learn to navigate objects to target zones while avoiding obstacles and following specific rules.

Each puzzle requires careful planning and precise control to move objects to their designated areas.

Think ahead and plan your movements carefully to succeed in each challenge.
lesson_formal_words_content:
Welcome to Formal Words! This section explores formal language theory and string manipulation.

You'll learn about formal languages, patterns, and string operations like concatenation, prefixes, and suffixes.

Each puzzle will test your understanding of how strings can be constructed and manipulated according to formal rules.

Focus on the patterns and rules presented in each exercise to solve the challenges.
level_boolean_gates_1_subtitle: Figure out how the levers control the outputs
level_boolean_gates_2_subtitle: Explore the relationships between levers and outputs
level_boolean_gates_3_subtitle: Discover what makes the outputs activate
level_boolean_gates_4_subtitle: Some levers may not affect the outputs at all
level_boolean_gates_6_subtitle: Watch how lever states change the outputs
level_boolean_gates_8_subtitle: The logic may vary between different outputs
level_boolean_gates_9_subtitle: Not all levers are connected - find which ones matter
level_color_sorting_1_subtitle: Arrange colors from least red to most red (5 colors)
level_color_sorting_2_subtitle: Arrange colors from least green to most green (5 colors)
level_color_sorting_3_subtitle: Arrange colors from least blue to most blue (5 colors)
level_color_sorting_6_subtitle: Arrange colors in hue order (circular - any starting point works)
level_color_sorting_8_subtitle: Arrange colors from least saturated to most saturated
level_color_sorting_9_subtitle: Arrange colors from darkest to brightest
level_color_sorting_12_subtitle: Sort 20 colors by redness (colors vary in other properties too)
level_color_sorting_13_subtitle: Sort 20 colors by hue (colors vary in brightness, saturation fixed)
level_color_sorting_14_subtitle: Sort 50 colors by brightness (colors vary in saturation, hue fixed)
level_color_sorting_15_subtitle: Sort 50 colors by hue (colors vary in brightness, saturation fixed)
level_control_zone_1_subtitle: Use the buttons to move the player to the target zone
level_control_zone_4_subtitle: Combine translation with rotation around the center
level_formal_words_2_subtitle: Concatenate 2-4 binary or hexadecimal words together
level_formal_words_3_subtitle: Write the reverse of an English word
level_formal_words_4_subtitle: Write the reverse of a binary or hexadecimal word
level_formal_words_5_subtitle: Determine if a binary or hexadecimal word is a palindrome
level_formal_words_6_subtitle: Determine if one word is a prefix of another
level_formal_words_7_subtitle: Determine if one word is a suffix of another
level_formal_words_8_subtitle: Determine if one word is a substring of another

level_fill_estimation_2_subtitle: Estimate the fill percentage of a square - multiple choice
level_fill_estimation_3_subtitle: Estimate the fill percentage of a disk gauge - multiple choice
